text:
AqSuH SiSA#nO vRuShaqBO na yuqddhmO Ga#nAGaqnaH kShOBa#Na-Scar.ShaNIqnAM | 
saMqkranda#nO&nimiqSha E#ka vIqraH Saqta(gm) sEnA# ajayath sAqkamindra#H || 
saMqkranda#nEnA nimiqShENa# jiqShNunA# yutkAqrENa# duScyavaqnEna# dhRuqShNunA$ | 
tadindrE#Na jayataq tath sa#haqddhvaMq ~MyudhO# naraq iShu#hastEnaq vRuShNA$ || 
sa iShu#hastaiqH sa ni#ShaMqgiBi#rvaqSI sa(gg)sra#ShTAq sa yudhaq indrO# gaqNEna# | 
saq(gm)qsRuqShTaqjith sO#maqpA bA#huSaqd^^rdhyU$d^^rdhvadha#nvAq prati#hitABiqrastA$ || 
bRuha#spatEq pari# dIyAq- [  ] 16
